name: Global Power
description:
To charge a fee per kWh based on potential power usage depending on items placed.
Government should not be charged a fee for power usage but can supliment the fund where nessary.
To prevent placement of power generators except for within power plant zones.

properties.Title: Power Generation (Steam Engine)
properties.UserDescription: Tracks PPM to calculate power generated.

properties.Title: Power Generation (Combustion Generator)
properties.UserDescription: Tracks PPM to calculate power generated.

properties.Title: Power Generation (Solar Generator)
properties.UserDescription: Tracks PPM to calculate power generated.

properties.Title: Power Generation (Wind Turbine)
properties.UserDescription: Tracks PPM to calculate power generated.

properties.Title: Fee for potential power used
properties.UserDescription:
Collects a fee each hour based on how much potential power could be used by the citizen or company with a multiplyer per kWh.
Default of 1 Pound per kWh but should be based on the fuel cost per hour for 1kW to give the cost per kWh plus a standing charge.
Steam engine = 9 crushed coal per kWh.
Conbustion Generator = 1 gasoline per kWh.
Bank account should be changed from Treasury.
